PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

- 04/2015 - 05/2016 : NTD Starch_Global Sales General  Manager

WORKING EXPERIENCE 
Time Duration 
07/2016 – 04/2019 
 Golden Eagle Co.,Ltd – Ho Chi Minh City 
Sourcing & Export  Manager 
. 
Import: mainly purchasing feed ingredients (Soya bean Meal, Corn, DORB, 
Rapeseed meal, Whey Permeat, SWP…etc) , Licking Block for Cow, 
Goat…Chemical, Cable and industrial machines in the world  
 
Sourcing suppliers and new products from more countries: EU, Asia, 
Japan, USA, South America, Africa, etc...  
 
Researching and  Developing new products 
 
Evaluating and selecting potential and reliable suppliers throughout their 
rewards or kinds of certificates achieved such as: ISO and so on, quantity 
of employee, Quality Control and R&D, manufacturing and exporting 
capacity, references from their customers in Vietnam or other countries.  
 
Researching international and local markets from more various 
information sources before making purchase orders. 
 
Negotiate prices, sales contract, quality and other terms. - Costing import 
prices into door to door prices based on import tax, FOB or CIF… to offer 
to domestic customers. 
 
 Following up and solving problems of cargo regarding to quality, quantity, 
etc regarding  to problem  of imported goods .  
 
Cooperating with Sales department or others to have a plan for new 
orders.  
 
Sales for animal feeds  if urgent demand and support sales department 
for price and info for market. 
Export: mainly export Agriculture products (gum rosin, tapioca starch, chip, 
sawdust charcoal…) from Vietnam.  
 
Seeking customers in the world  
 
Secretly updating price of competitors and market price. 
 
 Seeking, selecting the working reliable manufacturers in Vietnam.  
 
Working with more forwarders or shipping agents to have a good freight.  
 
Costing export prices and then offer to customers.  
 
If both agree, later negotiating with customers and suppliers in Vietnam 
for sales contract. 
 
 After customers accept all, requesting to open L/C, T/T in advanced or 
CAD, following up and exporting.  
       Following up and solving problems of customers after shipment. 
Time Duration 
04/2015 – 05/2016 
NTD Starch Corporation, Ho Chi Minh 
Global Sales General Manager 
Duties: 
Manufacturing, Exporting:  Tapioca Starch, Tapioca chips, Tapioca 
Residue 
Work closely and keep a good relationship with local and international 
suppliers for planning to purchase Tapioca starch, Tapioca chip and 
Tapioca Residue in Tay Ninh, Binh Phuoc, Thailand, Cambodia for 
exporting works. 
 Sourcing and seeking international and local customers from B2B 
websites, international fairs, conferences, custom data…related to paper, 
food, textile… to offer and gain orders.  
• Negotiate sales contract, payment term and shipment for customers and 
suppliers. 
Control the whole process of import, export, custom declaration 
VNACCS/VCIS, custom clearance, domestic transportation, logistic, 
…from A to Z. 
• Work closely with customs and other government departments related to 
import and export to refund import tax and VAT 
Apply for export and import license, updating and following new regulations 
and circulars… 
Manage the whole process of international payment such as : L/C, 
discount L/C, export sponsor from a bank, D/P, D/A and T/T. 
Manage the whole process of tax declaration online from Account 
department  
Apply for C/O form AI, E, D, B, A…. 
Prepare and Post Job ads , selecting and making an interview to 
candidates 
      Solve all relevant problems 
Time Duration 
03/2012 - 04/2015 
Venky’s Vietnam Co., LTD , Tay Ninh  
Purchasing Supervisor 
Duties: 
Manufacturing Animal feeds for Poultry 
• Establish foreign and domestic suppliers 
• Well mastered in Commercial Function in all aspects of Materials & 
Production Planning, Strategic Purchasing, Purchasing of Raw Materials  , 
Packing Materials, Consumables, Service Contracts, Inventory Management 
and logistics. 
• Source materials from suppliers, negotiate and purchase materials from 
oversea as well as from local market such as: (Wheat bran meal, DDGS, 
Yellow corn, SBM, Rapeseed Meal, DORB, Rice Bran, Tapioca chips, 
Canola Meal, Fish Meal…) and Feed Additves (Amino Acids, Vit, Premix, 
DCP, MCP, CuSO4…)etc. 
• Update price of raw materials and report to Manager daily. 
• Handle P.Os purchased from suppliers and solving problems of quality, 
quantity, delaying shipment and etc. 
• Applying for import license and other documents from Government. 
• Analyze market trend, forecast market trend and planning accordingly 
• Analyze market and delivery systems in order to assess present and 
future material availability. 
• Studying sales records and inventory levels. 
• Resolve vendor or contractor grievances, and claims against suppliers 
• Review purchase order claims and contracts for conformance to 
company policy 
• Arrange and sell disposal of surplus materials in warehouse. 
• Develop and implement purchasing and contract management 
instructions, policies, and procedures. 
Time Duration 
03/2007 - 01/2012 
Golden Eagle , HCM 
Import - Export Executive 
Duties: 
Import: mainly purchasing feed ingredients (Soya bean Meal, Corn, DORB,

Evaluating and selecting potential and reliable suppliers throughout their 
rewards or kinds of certificates achieved such as: ISO and so on, quantity

based on import tax, FOB or CIF… to offer to domestic customers. 
 
 Following up and solving problems of cargo regarding to quality, quantity, 
etc.  
 
Cooperating with Sales department or others to have a plan for new 
orders.  
 
Sales for animal feeds  if urgent demand and support sales department 
for price and info for market. 
Export: mainly export Agriculture products (gum rosin, tapioca starch, chip,

 
Seeking customers in the world  
 
Secretly updating price of competitors and market price. 
 
 Seeking, selecting the working reliable manufacturers in Vietnam.  
 
Working with more forwarders or shipping agents to have a good freight.  
 
Costing export prices and then offer to customers.  
 
If both agree, later negotiating with customers and suppliers in Vietnam 
for sales contract. 
 
 After customers accept all, requesting to open L/C, T/T in advanced or 
CAD, following up and exporting.  
Following up and solving problems of customers after shipment.

TIEP PHAT CO., LTD, HCM 
Secretary 
Duties: 
 
Preparing agenda and taking minutes for all meetings chaired by GM 
including B.O.M and Chairman meetings  
 
Translation all required documents and catalogues such as: consulting 
agreement, shrimp feed, medicines for aquaculture, agriculture, etc from 
English to Vietnamese and vice versa.  
 
Making import procedure for lots 
 
Checking and email distribution 
 
Write the official letter and other forms sent to the related agency (if 
required). 
 
Preparing sales contracts (international and domestic) if required. 
 
Making purchase orders to foreign companies 
Office administration management: 
 
Air ticket/hotel/meeting room booking/ visa application 
 
Printing matters such as: calendar, catalogues, souvenir gift, notebook 
and raincoats to customer. 
Supporting marketing department: 
 
Communicating clients 
 
Receiving purchase orders from customers 
 
Communicating factory and warehouse 
Prepare trucks to ship and delivery. 

